interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz Review Date: 2021/01/06 Store: CIMIY Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Liquid Volume': '0.3 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.54 x 3.58 x 1.22 inches; 11.64 Ounces'} Review Text: My daughter was sick of paying more money at the salon for them to paint her acrylics, so I got her the "CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz" to paint her nails with.
This polish requires an LED/UV lamp, so I also had to buy that for her. Other than that, this polish is great. It came with a base coat and a top coat, as well as 6 fall-inspired shades. The polish is very beautiful and doesn't make a huge mess. I had her put them under the lamp for 3 minutes after each coat and wound up using 2 coats of the colored polish on her nails. This gel polish hardens very nicely an doesn't get any dents or fingerprints.
Overall, I recommend this polish to people who are tired of overpaying at the salon. Review Title: Great polish Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest:** At-home nail care and manicure.
- **Product Preference:** Favors gel polish due to its durability and professional finish; values non-toxic and cruelty-free products.
- **Usage Context:** Engages in DIY nail art as a cost-effective alternative to salon services, particularly for acrylic nails.
- **Behavior Patterns:** Demonstrates a focus on quality and ease of use in nail products; appreciates comprehensive sets that include essential items like base and top coats.
- **Target Audience:** Interested in products suitable for both personal use and family, indicating a focus on practicality and affordability.
- **Seasonal Considerations:** Prefers colors that align with seasonal themes, suggesting a trend towards versatile and aesthetically pleasing options.
- **User Experience:** Values products that minimize mess and offer reliable performance, indicating a preference for user-friendly applications.

This summary encapsulates preferences for at-home manicures, cost-effectiveness, quality materials, and seasonal aesthetic choices while highlighting a family-oriented approach to nail care.
